text: Brickellia hastata is a North American species of shrubs in the daisy family. It is found only in the state of Baja California Sur in western Mexico.Bentham, George 1844. Botany of the Voyage of H.M.S. Sulphur 21–22. description in Latin, commentary in EnglishTurner, B. L. 1997. The Comps of Mexico: A systematic account of the family Asteraceae, vol. 1 – Eupatorieae. Phytologia Memoirs 11: i–iv, 1–272 ==References== ==External links== hastata Category:Flora of Baja California Sur Category:Plants described in 1844
title: Brickellia hastata
